entry.title: Jenil-Desai/Hashless: Hashless is a lightweight, high-performance hashing and verification library designed for serverless environments like AWS Lambda and Cloudflare Workers. It provides secure, efficient, and dependency-free hashing solutions optimized for edge computing and cloud-native applications.
entry.content: Hashless is a lightweight, high-performance hashing and verification library designed for serverless environments like AWS Lambda and Cloudflare Workers. It provides secure, efficient, and dependency-free hashing solutions optimized for edge computing and cloud-native applications.

entry.title: erfanezk/schedi: A lightweight and flexible task scheduling library for JavaScript & TypeScript. Easily manage interval-based and one-time tasks with precise execution control.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible task scheduling library for JavaScript & TypeScript. Easily manage interval-based and one-time tasks with precise execution control.

entry.title: Alwatr/nitrobase: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.
entry.content: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.
